tests.testsuite.app

Class TestApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testsuite.core.JemmyTestCase
      • tests.testsuite.app.TestApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.netbeans.jemmy.Scenario

    public class TestApp
extends JemmyTestCase
    Tests the test suite app. In Version 0.3 the structure has been revised.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Ren√© Majewski
